roi_calculation: Extremely High - Manual validation of schemas is not feasible or reliable. Automation is the only viable strategy.
maintenance_projection: 1 hour/month average, tied to schema changes.
infrastructure_setup: Jest and ts-jest configuration in the repository; CI/CD pipeline integration.
success_metrics: 100% of schemas have a corresponding test file. >95% overall code coverage. All tests run automatically on every PR.
risk_factors: Incomplete test cases that miss critical validation rules or edge cases.
mitigation_strategies: Mandatory code reviews with a focus on test completeness. Enforce coverage thresholds in CI.
business_value: Ensures the reliability of the single source of truth for all system data contracts, preventing system-wide data integrity issues.
